fn.p: Edited by: Jürgen Schleef, Institute for Maternal and Child Health Burlo Garofolo (IRCCS), Italy
Reviewed by: Marco Gasparella, University of Padua, Italy; José Estevão-Costa, Centro Hospitalar Universitário de São João (CHUSJ), Portugal
This article was submitted to Pediatric Surgery, a section of the journal Frontiers in Surgery
